text: U di gava, ku ji bona wan ra hatibe gotine; ewan, biryaren Yezdan hinartine hene! Werin bibin (peyrewe wan) u bibin peyrewe pexember. Ewan (aha) gotine: “Ewan biryaren ku em rast hatin, bav u bapiren me li ser dicun, bese me ye.” Gelo heke bav u bapiren wan qe tu tisteki nizanbin u ne hatibine reya rast ji (disa reya wan, bav u kalan bese wan e).”
